channel.title: Speakings on Kevin Duggan
channel.description: Recent content in Speakings on Kevin Duggan

item.title: Talk: Rediscovering Lean: From Idea to Sale in 6 Months
item.description: Slides from a take I gave at RebelCon 2019 around finding flow and success in a recent project.

item.title: Talk: Machine Learning, a Quick Introduction
item.description: Machine Learning is quite daunting for those who are unfamiliar with it. He is a brief introduction to some of the main concepts involved.

item.title: Talk: Analytics with Apache Spark
item.description: A talk I gave at CorkDev.io around my experience in using Apache Spark in production for big data streaming and batch workloads.

item.title: Talk: Kanban Metrics: what and why...
item.description: A quick run through what you should be tracking with Kanban, with some examples from teams I have worked on.

item.title: Talk: Care about your Code
item.description: You should care about the quality of your code, and SonarQube makes this easy.
